[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ^b^cariyaa^eb^ti ^a^V0.0393^ea^ ^a^P2.0225^ea^, a.t.tha cariyaayo -- iriyaapathacariyaa, aayatanacariyaa, saticariyaa, samaadhicariyaa, ~naa.nacariyaa, maggacariyaa, patticariyaa, lokatthacariyaati.

[03] ^b^iriyaapathacariyaa^eb^ti catuusu iriyaapathesu. ^b^aayatanacariyaa^eb^ti chasu ajjhattikabaahiresu aayatanesu. ^b^saticariyaa^eb^ti catuusu satipa.t.thaanesu. ^b^samaadhicariyaa^eb^ti catuusu jhaanesu. ^b^~naa.nacariyaa^eb^ti catuusu ariyasaccesu. ^b^maggacariyaa^eb^ti catuusu ariyamaggesu. ^b^patticariyaa^eb^ti catuusu saama~n~naphalesu. ^b^lokatthacariyaa^eb^ti tathaagatesu arahantesu sammaasambuddhesu padese {padeso (syaa0)} paccekabuddhesu padese saavakesu.

[03] iriyaapathacariyaa ^a^M0.0401^ea^ ca pa.nidhisampannaana.m. aayatanacariyaa ca indriyesu guttadvaaraana.m. saticariyaa ca appamaadavihaariina.m. samaadhicariyaa ca adhicittamanuyuttaana.m. ~naa.nacariyaa ca buddhisampannaana.m. maggacariyaa ca sammaapa.tipannaana.m. patticariyaa ca adhigataphalaana.m. lokatthacariyaa ca tathaagataana.m arahantaana.m sammaasambuddhaana.m padese paccekabuddhaana.m padese saavakaana.m. imaa a.t.tha cariyaayo.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ aparaapi ^a^T1.0616^ea^ a.t.tha cariyaayo. adhimuccanto saddhaaya carati, pagga.nhanto viiriyena carati, upa.t.thaapento satiyaa carati, avikkhepa.m karonto samaadhinaa carati, pajaananto pa~n~naaya carati, vijaananto vi~n~naa.nacariyaaya carati, eva.m pa.tipannassa ^a^P2.0226^ea^ kusalaa dhammaa aayaapentiiti aayatanacariyaaya carati, eva.m pa.tipanno visesamadhigacchatiiti visesacariyaaya carati. imaa a.t.tha cariyaayo.

[03] aparaapi ^a^V0.0394^ea^ a.t.tha cariyaayo. dassanacariyaa ca sammaadi.t.thiyaa, abhiniropanacariyaa ca sammaasa"nkappassa, pariggahacariyaa ca sammaavaacaaya, samu.t.thaanacariyaa ca sammaakammantassa, vodaanacariyaa ca sammaaaajiivassa, paggahacariyaa ca sammaavaayaamassa, upa.t.thaanacariyaa ca sammaasatiyaa, avikkhepacariyaa ca sammaasamaadhissa. imaa a.t.tha cariyaayoti.
[06] cariyaakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ ``tii.nimaani ^a^V0.0395^ea^ ^a^P2.0227^ea^, bhikkhave {a0 ni0 3.61 passitabbaa}, paa.tihaariyaani. katamaani tii.ni? iddhipaa.tihaariya.m, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] ^b^``katama~nca, bhikkhave, iddhipaa.tihaariya.m?^eb^ idha, bhikkhave, ekacco anekavihita.m iddhividha.m paccanubhoti -- ekopi hutvaa bahudhaa hoti ^a^T1.0617^ea^, bahudhaapi hutvaa eko hoti; aavibhaava.m tirobhaava.m...pe0... yaava brahmalokaapi kaayena vasa.m vatteti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, iddhipaa.tihaariya.m.

[01] ^b^``katama~nca^eb^ ^a^M0.0402^ea^, ^b^bhikkhave, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m?^eb^ idha, bhikkhave, ekacco nimittena aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati, tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati, api ca kho manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati, tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati, napi manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati, api ca kho vitakkayato vicaarayato vitakkavipphaarasadda.m sutvaa aadisati -- `evampi te mano, itthampi te mano, itipi te citta'nti. so bahu.m cepi aadisati, tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco na heva kho nimittena aadisati, napi manussaana.m vaa amanussaana.m vaa devataana.m vaa sadda.m sutvaa aadisati, napi vitakkayato vicaarayato vitakkavipphaarasadda.m ^a^P2.0228^ea^ sutvaa aadisati, api ca kho avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhi.m samaapannassa cetasaa ceto paricca pajaanaati -- `yathaa imassa bhoto manosa"nkhaaraa ^a^T1.0618^ea^ pa.nihitaa imassa {tathaa imassa (syaa0), yathaa imassa (ka0) a0 ni0 3.61 passitabbaa} cittassa anantaraa amuka.m naama vitakka.m vitakkayissatii'ti ^a^V0.0396^ea^ {vitakkessatiiti (syaa0) a0 ni0 3.61}. so bahu.m cepi aadisati, tatheva ta.m hoti, no a~n~nathaa. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] ^b^``katama~nca, bhikkhave, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m?^eb^ idha, bhikkhave, ekacco evamanusaasati -- `eva.m vitakketha, maa eva.m vitakkayittha. eva.m manasi karotha, maa eva.m manasi karittha. ida.m pajahatha, ida.m upasampajja viharathaa'ti. ida.m vuccati, bhikkhave, anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m. imaani kho, bhikkhave, tii.ni paa.tihaariyaani''.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ nekkhamma.m ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. kaamacchanda.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye tena nekkhammena samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa anaavilasa"nkappaati -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``ta.m kho pana nekkhamma.m eva.m aasevitabba.m, eva.m bhaavetabba.m ^a^M0.0403^ea^, eva.m bahuliikaatabba.m, eva.m tadanudhammataa sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] abyaapaado ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. byaapaada.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye tena abyaapaadena samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa anaavilasa"nkappaati -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``so kho pana abyaapaado eva.m aasevitabbo, eva.m bhaavetabbo, eva.m bahuliikaatabbo, eva.m tadanudhammataa sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] aalokasa~n~naa ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. thinamiddha.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye taaya aalokasa~n~naaya samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa anaavilasa"nkappaati ^a^T1.0619^ea^ -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``saa kho pana aalokasa~n~naa eva.m aasevitabbaa, eva.m bhaavetabbaa, eva.m bahuliikaatabbaa, eva.m tadanudhammataa sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] avikkhepo ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. uddhacca.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye tena avikkhepena samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa ^a^P2.0229^ea^ anaavilasa"nkappaati -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``so kho pana avikkhepo eva.m aasevitabbo, eva.m bhaavetabbo, eva.m bahuliikaatabbo, eva.m tadanudhammataa sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] dhammavavatthaana.m ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. vicikiccha.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye tena dhammavavatthaanena samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa anaavilasa"nkappaati -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``ta.m ^a^V0.0397^ea^ kho pana dhammavavatthaana.m eva.m aasevitabba.m, eva.m bhaavetabba.m, eva.m bahuliikaatabba.m, eva.m tadanudhammataa, sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] ~naa.na.m ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. avijja.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye tena ~naa.nena samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa anaavilasa"nkappaati -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``ta.m kho pana ~naa.na.m eva.m aasevitabba.m, eva.m bhaavetabba.m, eva.m bahuliikaatabba.m, eva.m tadanudhammataa sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] paamojja.m ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. arati.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye tena paamojjena samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa anaavilasa"nkappaati -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``ta.m kho pana paamojja.m eva.m aasevitabba.m, eva.m bhaavetabba.m ^a^M0.0404^ea^, eva.m bahuliikaatabba.m, eva.m tadanudhammataa sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m...pe0....

[03] pa.thama.m jhaana.m ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. niivara.ne pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye tena pa.thamena jhaanena samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa anaavilasa"nkappaati -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``ta.m kho pana pa.thama.m jhaana.m eva.m aasevitabba.m, eva.m bhaavetabba.m, eva.m bahuliikaatabba.m, eva.m tadanudhammataa sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m...pe0....

[03] arahattamaggo ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. sabbakilese pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. ye tena arahattamaggena samannaagataa, sabbe te visuddhacittaa anaavilasa"nkappaati -- aadesanaapaa.tihaariya.m. ``so kho pana arahattamaggo eva.m aasevitabbo, eva.m bhaavetabbo, eva.m bahuliikaatabbo, eva.m tadanudhammataa sati upa.t.thaapetabbaa''ti -- anusaasaniipaa.tihaariya.m.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ nekkhamma.m ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. kaamacchanda.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. yaa ca iddhi ya~nca paa.tihaariya.m, ida.m vuccati iddhipaa.tihaariya.m. abyaapaado ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. byaapaada.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. yaa ca iddhi ya~nca paa.tihaariya.m, ida.m vuccati iddhipaa.tihaariya.m. aalokasa~n~naa ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. thinamiddha.m pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m...pe0... arahattamaggo ijjhatiiti -- iddhi. sabbakilese pa.tiharatiiti -- paa.tihaariya.m. yaa ca iddhi ya~nca paa.tihaariya.m, ida.m vuccati iddhipaa.tihaariyanti ^a^T1.0620^ea^.
[06] paa.tihaariyakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ sabbadhammaana.m ^a^V0.0398^ea^ ^a^P2.0230^ea^ {sabbesa.m dhammaana.m (ka0) pa.ti0 ma0 1.87 passitabbaa} sammaasamucchede nirodhe ca anupa.t.thaanataa pa~n~naa samasiisa.t.the ~naa.na.m.

[03] ^b^sabbadhammaana^eb^nti pa~ncakkhandhaa, dvaadasaayatanaani, a.t.thaarasa dhaatuyo, kusalaa dhammaa, akusalaa dhammaa, abyaakataa dhammaa, kaamaavacaraa dhammaa, ruupaavacaraa dhammaa, aruupaavacaraa dhammaa, apariyaapannaa dhammaa. ^b^sammaa samucchede^eb^ti nekkhammena ^a^M0.0405^ea^ kaamacchanda.m sammaa samucchindati, abyaapaadena byaapaada.m sammaa samucchindati, aalokasa~n~naaya thinamiddha.m sammaa samucchindati, avikkhepena uddhacca.m sammaa samucchindati, dhammavavatthaanena vicikiccha.m sammaa samucchindati, ~naa.nena avijja.m sammaa samucchindati, paamojjena arati.m sammaa samucchindati, pa.thamena jhaanena niivara.ne sammaa samucchindati...pe0... arahattamaggena sabbakilese sammaa samucchindati.

[03] ^b^nirodhe^eb^ti nekkhammena kaamacchanda.m nirodheti, abyaapaadena byaapaada.m nirodheti, aalokasa~n~naaya thinamiddha.m nirodheti, avikkhepena ^a^T1.0621^ea^ uddhacca.m nirodheti, dhammavavatthaanena vicikiccha.m nirodheti, ~naa.nena avijja.m nirodheti, paamojjena arati.m nirodheti, pa.thamena jhaanena niivara.ne nirodheti...pe0... arahattamaggena sabbakilese nirodheti.

[03] ^b^anupa.t.thaanataa^eb^ti nekkhamma.m pa.tiladdhassa kaamacchando na upa.t.thaati, abyaapaada.m pa.tiladdhassa byaapaado na upa.t.thaati, aalokasa~n~na.m pa.tiladdhassa thinamiddha.m na upa.t.thaati, avikkhepa.m pa.tiladdhassa uddhacca.m na upa.t.thaati, dhammavavatthaana.m pa.tiladdhassa vicikicchaa na upa.t.thaati, ~naa.na.m pa.tiladdhassa avijjaa na upa.t.thaati, paamojja.m pa.tiladdhassa arati na upa.t.thaati, pa.thama.m jhaana.m pa.tiladdhassa ^a^V0.0399^ea^ ^a^P2.0231^ea^ niivara.naa na upa.t.thanti...pe0... arahattamagga.m pa.tiladdhassa sabbakilesaa na upa.t.thanti.

[03] ^b^sama^eb^nti kaamacchandassa pahiinattaa nekkhamma.m sama.m, byaapaadassa pahiinattaa abyaapaado sama.m, thinamiddhassa pahiinattaa aalokasa~n~naa sama.m, uddhaccassa pahiinattaa avikkhepo sama.m, vicikicchaaya pahiinattaa dhammavavatthaana.m sama.m, avijjaaya pahiinattaa ~naa.na.m sama.m, aratiyaa pahiinattaa paamojja.m sama.m, niivara.naana.m pahiinattaa pa.thama.m jhaana.m sama.m...pe0... sabbakilesaana.m pahiinattaa arahattamaggo sama.m.

[03] ^b^siisa^eb^nti terasa siisaani -- palibodhasiisa~nca ta.nhaa, vinibandhanasiisa~nca maano ^a^T1.0622^ea^, paraamaasasiisa~nca di.t.thi, vikkhepasiisa~nca uddhacca.m, sa.mkilesasiisa~nca avijjaa, adhimokkhasiisa~nca saddhaa, paggahasiisa~nca viiriya.m, upa.t.thaanasiisa~nca sati, avikkhepasiisa~nca samaadhi, dassanasiisa~nca pa~n~naa, pavattasiisa~nca jiivitindriya.m, gocarasiisa~nca vimokkho, sa"nkhaarasiisa~nca nirodhoti.
[06] samasiisakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ saavatthinidaana.m ^a^V0.0400^ea^ ^a^M0.0406^ea^. ``cattaarome ^a^P2.0232^ea^, bhikkhave, satipa.t.thaanaa. katame cattaaro? idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. vedanaasu...pe0... citte... dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati aataapii sampajaano satimaa, vineyya loke abhijjhaadomanassa.m. ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaaro satipa.t.thaanaa''ti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ [ka] katha.m ^b^kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati? ^eb^ idhekacco pathaviikaaya.m aniccato anupassati, no niccato; dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato; anattato anupassati, no attato; nibbindati, no nandati; virajjati, no rajjati; nirodheti, no samudeti, pa.tinissajjati, no aadiyati ^a^T1.0623^ea^. aniccato anupassanto niccasa~n~na.m pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasa~n~na.m pajahati, anattato anupassanto attasa~n~na.m pajahati, nibbindanto nandi.m pajahati, virajjanto raaga.m pajahati, nirodhento samudaya.m pajahati, pa.tinissajjanto aadaana.m pajahati. imehi sattahi aakaarehi kaaya.m anupassati. kaayo upa.t.thaana.m, no sati. sati upa.t.thaana~nceva sati ca. taaya satiyaa tena ~naa.nena ta.m kaaya.m anupassati. tena vuccati -- ``kaaye kaayaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaanaa''.

[03] ^b^bhaavanaa^eb^ti catasso bhaavanaa -- tattha jaataana.m dhammaana.m anativattana.t.thena bhaavanaa, indriyaana.m ekarasa.t.thena bhaavanaa, tadupagaviiriyavaahana.t.thena bhaavanaa, aasevana.t.thena bhaavanaa.

[03] idhekacco aapokaaya.m...pe0... tejokaaya.m... vaayokaaya.m... kesakaaya.m... lomakaaya.m... chavikaaya.m... cammakaaya.m... ma.msakaaya.m... rudhirakaaya.m... nhaarukaaya.m {nahaarukaaya.m (syaa0)} ... a.t.thikaaya.m... a.t.thimi~njakaaya.m ^a^V0.0401^ea^ aniccato anupassati, no niccato; dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato ^a^P2.0233^ea^; anattato anupassati, no attato; nibbindati, no nandati; virajjati, no rajjati, nirodheti, no samudeti; pa.tinissajjati, no aadiyati. aniccato anupassanto niccasa~n~na.m pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasa~n~na.m pajahati, anattato anupassanto attasa~n~na.m pajahati, nibbindanto ^a^M0.0407^ea^ nandi.m pajahati, virajjanto raaga.m pajahati, nirodhento samudaya.m pajahati, pa.tinissajjanto aadaana.m pajahati ^a^T1.0624^ea^. imehi sattahi aakaarehi kaaya.m anupassati. kaayo upa.t.thaana.m, no sati. sati upa.t.thaana~nceva sati ca. taaya satiyaa tena ~naa.nena ta.m kaaya.m anupassati. tena vuccati -- ``kaaye kaayaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaanaa''.

[03] ^b^bhaavanaa^eb^ti catasso bhaavanaa -- tattha jaataana.m dhammaana.m anativattana.t.thena bhaavanaa, indriyaana.m ekarasa.t.thena bhaavanaa, tadupagaviiriyavaahana.t.thena bhaavanaa, aasevana.t.thena bhaavanaa. eva.m kaaye kaayaanupassii viharati.

[03] [kha] katha.m ^b^vedanaasu vedanaanupassii viharati?^eb^ idhekacco sukha.m vedana.m aniccato anupassati, no niccato...pe0... pa.tinissajjati, no aadiyati. aniccato anupassanto niccasa~n~na.m pajahati...pe0... pa.tinissajjanto aadaana.m pajahati. imehi sattahi aakaarehi vedana.m anupassati. vedanaa upa.t.thaana.m, no sati. sati upa.t.thaana~nceva sati ca. taaya satiyaa tena ~naa.nena ta.m vedana.m anupassati. tena vuccati -- ``vedanaasu vedanaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaanaa''.

[03] ^b^bhaavanaa^eb^ti catasso bhaavanaa...pe0... aasevana.t.thena bhaavanaa...pe0... idhekacco dukkha.m vedana.m...pe0... adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m... saamisa.m sukha.m vedana.m... niraamisa.m sukha.m vedana.m... saamisa.m dukkha.m vedana.m... niraamisa.m dukkha.m vedana.m... saamisa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m... niraamisa.m adukkhamasukha.m vedana.m... cakkhusamphassaja.m vedana.m... sotasamphassaja.m vedana.m... ghaanasamphassaja.m vedana.m... jivhaasamphassaja.m vedana.m... kaayasamphassaja.m vedana.m... manosamphassaja.m vedana.m aniccato anupassati, no niccato...pe0... pa.tinissajjati, no aadiyati. aniccato anupassanto niccasa~n~na.m pajahati...pe0... pa.tinissajjanto aadaana.m pajahati. imehi sattahi aakaarehi vedana.m anupassati. vedanaa upa.t.thaana.m, no sati. sati upa.t.thaana~nceva sati ca. taaya satiyaa tena ~naa.nena ta.m vedana.m anupassati. tena vuccati -- ``vedanaasu vedanaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaanaa''.

[03] idhekacco viitaraaga.m citta.m...pe0... sadosa.m citta.m... viitadosa.m citta.m... samoha.m citta.m... viitamoha.m citta.m... sa.mkhitta.m citta.m... vikkhitta.m citta.m... mahaggata.m citta.m... amahaggata.m citta.m... sauttara.m citta.m... anuttara.m citta.m... samaahita.m citta.m... asamaahita.m citta.m... vimutta.m citta.m... avimutta.m citta.m... cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m... sotavi~n~naa.na.m... ghaanavi~n~naa.na.m... jivhaavi~n~naa.na.m... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m... manovi~n~naa.na.m aniccato anupassati, no niccato...pe0... pa.tinissajjati, no aadiyati. ^b^aniccato anupassanto^eb^ niccasa~n~na.m pajahati...pe0... pa.tinissajjanto aadaana.m pajahati. imehi sattahi aakaarehi citta.m anupassati. citta.m upa.t.thaana.m, no sati. sati upa.t.thaana~nceva sati ca. taaya satiyaa tena ^a^T1.0626^ea^ ~naa.nena ta.m citta.m anupassati. tena vuccati -- ``citte cittaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaanaa''.
[03] ^b^bhaavanaa^eb^ti catasso bhaavanaa...pe0... aasevana.t.thena bhaavanaa. eva.m citte cittaanupassii viharati.

[03] [gha] katha.m ^b^dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharati?^eb^ idhekacco .thapetvaa kaaya.m .thapetvaa vedana.m .thapetvaa citta.m tadavasese dhamme aniccato anupassati, no niccato; dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato; anattato anupassati, no attato; nibbindati, no nandati; virajjati, no rajjati; nirodheti, no samudeti; pa.tinissajjati, no aadiyati. aniccato anupassanto niccasa~n~na.m pajahati, dukkhato anupassanto sukhasa~n~na.m pajahati, anattato anupassanto attasa~n~na.m pajahati, nibbindanto nandi.m pajahati, virajjanto raaga.m pajahati, nirodhento samudaya.m pajahati, pa.tinissajjanto aadaana.m pajahati. imehi sattahi aakaarehi te dhamme anupassati. dhammaa upa.t.thaana.m, no sati. sati upa.t.thaana~nceva sati ca. taaya satiyaa tena ~naa.nena te ^a^M0.0409^ea^ dhamme anupassati. tena vuccati -- ``dhammesu dhammaanupassanaasatipa.t.thaanaa''.

[03] ^b^bhaavanaa^eb^ti ^a^V0.0403^ea^ ^a^P2.0235^ea^ catasso bhaavanaa -- tattha jaataana.m dhammaana.m anativattana.t.thena bhaavanaa, indriyaana.m ekarasa.t.thena bhaavanaa, tadupagaviiriyavaahana.t.thena bhaavanaa, aasevana.t.thena bhaavanaa. eva.m ^a^T1.0627^ea^ dhammesu dhammaanupassii viharatiiti.
[06] satipa.t.thaanakathaa ni.t.thitaa.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ eva.m ^a^V0.0404^ea^ ^a^P2.0236^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. tatra kho bhagavaa bhikkhuu aamantesi -- ``bhikkhavo''ti. ``bhadante''ti te bhikkhuu bhagavato paccassosu.m. bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ka~nci {ki~nci (ka0) a0 ni0 6.99-100 passitabbaa} sa"nkhaara.m niccato samanupassanto anulomikaaya khantiyaa samannaagato bhavissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati; anulomikaaya khantiyaa asamannaagato sammattaniyaama.m okkamissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati; sammattaniyaama.m anokkamamaano sotaapattiphala.m vaa sakadaagaamiphala.m vaa anaagaamiphala.m vaa arahatta.m vaa {arahattaphala.m vaa (syaa0 ka0) a0 ni0 6.98 passitabbaa} sacchikarissatiiti -- neta.m .thaana.m vijjati.
